ygData.subject: Utterly OT - Black Helicopters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I sure hope not - he was the best thing to happen to us.  And the Enchanters still have their ace in the hole (See Baelish s site, he has weekly talks)
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:44 AM 8/11/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Does anyone know what happened to JM Capozzi. I'm sure he could settle this
>issue once and for all. Did Verant put a muzzle on him for posting details
>of game mechanics on this list?

I sure hope not - he was the best thing to happen to us. And the
Enchanters still have their "ace in the hole" (See Baelish's site, he has
weekly talks)

>Also, I'm in the US Army and have been playing EQ since April. Until today
>I have never seen/heard the term Black Helicopter used as a reference to
>anything, military or EQ related. What does this reference mean?

Weellll - Seems that as rumours go, Hanger 18 and all, somehow the rumours
began to include Black Helicopters. South Park and the Simpsons and other
parodies make endless fun of it. The first reference I heard was the
relationship of Black Helicopters to mutilated cattle. Seems where you saw
the latter, the former would appear....
but there's more at alt.conspiracy.black.helicopters (chuckles)

Talies the Wanderer
